main event: A woman in Malden, Massachusetts saw a white light pass by her window twice, larger and without any reflection, in May 1960.
interesting points: The light appeared to be moving at a high speed, estimated around 2,500 mph.
The object was stationary and hovering at an estimated altitude of 20 feet and distance of 25 feet from the observer.
The woman described the object as a 'huge' and 'diffuse white light'.
The woman's letter requesting information was not answered.
